text: @NYGovCuomo Oh I get it. You give the Nursing home who’s strapped with resources an impossible task to care for COVID19 patient you jam in there, and then fire/shut them down if they don’t pull off a miracle from the disaster YOU created!?  You’re a disgusting, and incompetent fool!
